reviews.Subject: Physics
reviews.Reviews: Excellent lecturer, makes complex topics accessible.

reviews.Subject: Computer Science
reviews.Reviews: Brilliant instructor, always willing to help outside of class.

reviews.Subject: Biology
reviews.Reviews: Knowledgeable but lectures can be dry at times.

reviews.Subject: History
reviews.Reviews: Passionate about the subject, brings history to life.

reviews.Subject: Psychology
reviews.Reviews: Engaging lectures and interesting assignments.

reviews.Subject: Mathematics
reviews.Reviews: Difficult to follow, often moves too fast through material.

reviews.Subject: Chemistry
reviews.Reviews: Clear explanations and helpful lab demonstrations.

reviews.Subject: English Literature
reviews.Reviews: Insightful analysis of texts, encourages critical thinking.

reviews.Subject: Sociology
reviews.Reviews: Interesting topics but could improve on classroom management.

reviews.Subject: Economics
reviews.Reviews: Makes economics relevant with real-world examples.

reviews.Subject: Art History
reviews.Reviews: Passionate about art, lectures are like virtual museum tours.

reviews.Subject: Political Science
reviews.Reviews: Knowledgeable but could be more objective in discussions.

reviews.Subject: Neuroscience
reviews.Reviews: Cutting-edge research incorporated into lessons, very inspiring.

reviews.Subject: Philosophy
reviews.Reviews: Challenges students to think deeply, great discussions.

reviews.Subject: Environmental Science
reviews.Reviews: Engaging field trips and practical applications of theories.

reviews.Subject: Business Administration
reviews.Reviews: Seems disorganized, often unprepared for lectures.

reviews.Subject: Linguistics
reviews.Reviews: Fascinating subject matter, professor is clearly an expert.

reviews.Subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.Reviews: Tough grader but fair, prepare to work hard.

reviews.Subject: Anthropology
reviews.Reviews: Captivating storyteller, makes ancient cultures come alive.

reviews.Subject: Music Theory
reviews.Reviews: Patient instructor, great at explaining complex concepts.
